scripts.test: nyc --reporter=lcov jasmine JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=spec/support/jasmine_unit.json && nyc --reporter=lcov karma start --single-run --browsers ChromeHeadless && nyc --reporter=lcov jasmine JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=spec/support/jasmine_integrate.json
scripts.coverage: curl -Os https://uploader.codecov.io/latest/linux/codecov && chmod +x codecov && nyc --reporter=lcov jasmine JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=spec/support/jasmine_unit.json && ./codecov -Z -F unittests && nyc --reporter=lcov karma start --single-run --browsers ChromeHeadless && ./codecov -Z -F unittests && nyc --reporter=lcov jasmine JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=spec/support/jasmine_integrate.json && ./codecov -Z -F integration
